articles.title: Baby Boomers more likely to have multiple health issues than earlier generations - Study Finds
articles.description: Researchers warn that the growing rate of multiple chronic health conditions among older Americans represents a real health threat to the nation.
articles.content:
UNIVERSITY PARK, Pa. — Baby boomers are more likely to live with numerous chronic health conditions than earlier generations, according to new research from Penn State and Texas State University.
